author: Jay Moo
comment: I think its expensive.... But i do really love the look. Gj on being simple & original. PLEASE add a step counter into this watch face.

author: Trina B.
comment: Very poor battery life on my Moto 360 1st generation. Down to 35% battery with about 5 hours of very little use. Uninstalled.

author: Rob DeMillo
comment: This watch face never shows up on my moto 360 sport no matter what I do

author: George Nerenberg
comment: It worked when i first got it now it doesnt

reply.author: ATEKTURA/
reply.content: More details will be appreciated: contact@atektura.watch

author: Allie Rust-DEye
comment: Looks great, settings are easy, can't ask for much else.

author: James Fox
comment: Love the ambient face.  Thanks for a great effort.

author: Nokia Khan
comment: 👎🖕poooooooooor
Works great with my smart watch!!!!

author: Francisco Reyes
comment: It's good but I don't use ambient  mode  but when I look at my watch there is a delay.  I see black and white clock first  and then I see the regular one.  Is there any way to disable it? Please fix

reply.author: ATEKTURA/
reply.content: Thank you for your feedback, I'll try to fix that with the next update!

title: Good but...

author: w3st0nr0x
comment: i cant pick any different colors the app always crashes. and also the phone battery percentage doesn't work, it always shows 0%

reply.author: ATEKTURA/
reply.content: Please send me some more detailed info: contact@atektura.watch

author: Francine Bohr
comment: I had to update my watch now I cant get this this face to work eith it anymore.

reply.author: ATEKTURA/
reply.content: Please send me some more detailed info: contact@atektura.watch

title: Trouble

author: Ken Gartley
comment: This app works nice on my LG smart watch. No problems, the app works well. Hey isn't that what apps are supposed to do?
title: Glowing goodness

author: abeedha ahmed
comment: Absolutely brilliant.  Love the fact  that you can personalise it. It works instantly with my smart watch huawai.
title: Works very well

author: Hawood Giles
comment: What's not to like!
title: Pretty Glow

author: Karla Kruizenga
comment: Love love love the colors & new updates!

author: tim back
comment: Awso

author: Caleb Clarke
comment: I'm loving the new update, it makes my LG Watch Urbane all the more cooler! My only gripe is although the new font looks kinda nice I liked the old one a little bit more, so maybe include an option to switch between the two. Other than that this face is perfect!

reply.author: ATEKTURA/
reply.content: Thank you, it's so nice to hear such feedback! I changed font due to the one that face numbers are in, but i'm going to make more choice over fonts with next updates, so stay tuned and enjoy the app :) P.S. photo of your smartwatch and Analog Glow setup is always welcome, post it on my G+ page if you want :)

title: My favorite watchface!

author: Josh Veerkamp
comment: Moto 360 doesn't update watch face when edited, does not update settings on watch just says "loading..." On all settings.

author: David Courtney
comment: Love how the neon colors pop! Looks great!! Wish I had the option to have a small digital time in the watch face as well.

reply.author: ATEKTURA/
reply.content: There is a digital version of the watch face in Play Store (separate app). Contact me if you'd like to get a promo code and try it out: contact@atektura.watch

title: Love it!

author: Danny Roque
comment: Beautiful superb watch face great job thanks.
title: Awesome amazing

author: Adam Gachagan
comment: Probably the best watch face out there right now but if you could add in the numbers at the sides it would be perfect

reply.author: ATEKTURA/
reply.content: I already have it on my update list :) Stay tuned! EDIT: 3.2 update is uploaded and will be ready for download in few hours. It includes some new design customization options including numbers ;)

title: Great but almost perfect

author: Oscar Perez
comment: Doesn't even work and I tried all the stupid instructions

reply.author: ATEKTURA/
reply.content: Hello, additional feedback would be appreciated. Please send me some details via email: contact@atektura.watch - what smartwatch do you own, and what exactly do you mean by "doesn't even work"? Thank you, Maciej

author: Cody Sims
comment: No more push notifications, though, or I'll be back with 1 star.
title: Great update, thanks.

author: Kyler Fuller
comment: Looks good.

reply.author: ATEKTURA/
reply.content: Hello Kyler, please follow these steps: charge up both your watch and phone, open Android Wear app, go to settings>moto 360 and hit "Resync apps" option, then wait until the watch face get on your device. It may take some time so be patient. If you have any more problems, I'm here for you to help: contact@atektura.watch

title: Well.

author: Payton Standfill
comment: One of my favorites for using at night!
title: Awesome!

author: Mc Dogest
comment: Maciej, keep up the excellent work. If I had the chance to ask for anything it would be to be able to change the color by RGB or HEX code. Awesome face though. Thank you
title: Great on LG G Watch R

comment: If I like your watchface, I'll use the link you provide in the app to look at more of yours. I don't want to receive a notification for a "new face" that came out over a month ago. Uninstalled and 1-starred.

reply.author: ATEKTURA/
reply.content: Sorry for how you feel about that, but It's my job, it's what I do for a living. Being a developer is a hard thing to do, and sometimes we need to use tools such as pushes. I used it now, once, for self promotion. I'm in perspective of being dad in a month or so. Honestly, I'm just trying to make a little more money. Sorry that it made you feel mad

title: I don't need pushed notifications for watchfaces

author: Bogdan Oprea
comment: 1 star because you use push notifications for ads to other products. I am also reporting you to google for this. I paid for this so I can have a watch face. This is an insult to my work

reply.author: ATEKTURA/
reply.content: Hello, I don't think it's against any Google Play rules, but you've got your right to be mad when such thing happens. Be sure that I'm using pushes very rarely, usually for app updates info, at most for self-promotion. Sorry for your unpleasant experience, hope you'll understand.

title: 1 star because you use push notifications

author: Thomas Stolz
comment: Love the colors simple and awesome, just like I like it! New updates are cool watch face eats battery like pac man on pills!
title: Great watch face

author: Stephen Crooks
comment: I like the watch face. No need to spam with push message when you release a new face though. 2 stars for the message.

reply.author: ATEKTURA/
reply.content: Be sure that I'm not going to overuse it. Apps are what i do for a living, and sometimes i need to "talk" to my users. I thought that those who like Glow, would also like this new face. I wouldn't do that if it didn't fit the style of what you've bought. Nevertheless - you've got your rights too, so I'm sorry for unwanted interruptions.

title: Nice watch face.

author: Michael Wolfe
comment: The colors really pop, which certainly makes the watch look great. I have an Asus ZenWatch, so it is square, and I do have to echo a prior reviewers comment about it looking a little strange on the Square face. Perhaps introducing not only the option to change colors, but also change the clock outline to square or circle, user choice. I think that would be awesome. Also, adding the date would be great, too. Both improvements would make it 5 stars for me. Keep up the good work!

reply.author: ATEKTURA/
reply.content: Hello Michael. I was working on the 3.0 update lately. It's already available, but I needed to focus on the app performance due to high battery consumption that some users experienced. Face rendering was also improved for square screens. There are already some plans for future updates, so you can expect what you're asking for :) Thanks, Maciej.

title: Love the colors, but could use a few options.

author: Ian Williams
comment: This is one of my favorite watch faces by far. It looks even better than in the pictures. I bought it for what it was, and have no regrets. I would however, like to add an option for date, and perhaps a few other colors like yellow, gold, black (inverted version of white), or light pink (gf needs a color too.) Even without those though, this is a 5 star purchase.

reply.author: ATEKTURA/
reply.content: Date and more features are coming in 3.1 update. Stay tuned. Thanks, Maciej.

title: Excellent as is...

author: Dorian Green
comment: The pictures in Google Play made me believe this was a great app. However,  after purchasing the app, it never appeared in my phone or Moto 360 device. I Uninstalled it and reinstalled it, and the same thing happened. I would love to use this app.

reply.author: ATEKTURA/
reply.content: Hello, please make sure your watch battery is charged (when it's low it may not sync with a smartphone). Then try to force-sync via Android Wear app on your phone. If it won't help, please contact me: contact@atektura.watch EDIT: Hello Dorian, was it helpful? Did you make the app work on your device?

title: Doesn't open

author: jovanni carlos
comment: I wish that black was a true black. I have the G watch R and it has the P-OLED and not a LCD display and it should be producing black pixels as in turned off. But instead it shows a hint of gray on the watch increasing battery drain. Could you possibly fix this for all OLED displays? Thanks!

reply.author: ATEKTURA/
reply.content: Thank you for this valuable feedback. I've already made some improvements to the app performance in 3.0 update. I'm going to add a "full black" option to 3.1 version.

title: It looks nice but

author: Thomas White
comment: Call me picky, but this face would look great squarified on the square watches! :-) just my two cents.... Edit! Also, there is a pixel wide line going across the bottom of my screen that moves with the glow..:\

reply.author: ATEKTURA/
reply.content: I'll focus on that issues in the next update, thank you for your feedback. EDIT: Hello again, Thomas. 3.0 update was focused on app performance and square face rendering. Hope it's fully enjoyable now. Please let me know what you think. Thanks, Maciej.

title: Not liking it on square devices

author: brett cuff
comment: Why is there grey on the watch face? On an oled screen anything besides black is going to drain battery which is a big problem for a small battery

reply.author: ATEKTURA/
reply.content: "Full Black" option will be available in 3.1 version. Stay tuned. Thanks, Maciej.

title: Looks great and colors pop but...

author: José Antonio Rey
comment: It's a good concept, but not looking good on a square watch. Also, has an annoying bug with a line at the bottom that randomly moves. Slight line, but annoying.

reply.author: ATEKTURA/
reply.content: Hello, I hope that 3.0 update now works better, please let me know what do you think. Thanks, Maciej.

title: Problems with face

author: Karen Carter
comment: Love it would have given 5 stars just a shame about that wee line moving across the bottom.  Aware developer is looking into it. Hope there is a fix soon

reply.author: ATEKTURA/
reply.content: Hello Karen. It was a while but finally 3.0 update has a fix on that square screens issue. Hope you like it, let me know what you think :) Thanks, Maciej.

title: Like colours

author: Lee Yik Wei
comment: Can you please change the Watchface larger in ambient mode. It's look quite small on my LG gwatch r.
title: Awesome

author: Kyle Rhodes
comment: It seems the watch face drains a lot more battery then the built in watch faces. I have a Moto 360 and it doesn't make it though the day with this face. With the minimal watch face, I'm left with 30% at the end of the day.

reply.author: ATEKTURA/
reply.content: Thank you, this is a very valuable feedback. I will look into that problem as soon as possible. Hope you enjoy it anyway :) More details always appreciated: contact@atektura.watch EDIT: 3.0 update was focused on battery performance. Please let me know what you think. Thanks, Maciej.

title: Beautiful and Draining
